name: Emily Zhang
persona: Emily Zhang is a 21-year-old Biochemistry major who consistently demonstrates exceptional academic performance, reflected in her high CGPA of 3.87. Highly motivated and disciplined, Emily sets ambitious goals for herself and works diligently to achieve them. She manages stress effectively during exams and perseveres through challenges, making her a role model among her peers. Emily’s strong sense of self-efficacy and conscientiousness drive her to excel both in and out of the classroom.
